meanings.definition: The process in which a nucleus is broken apart by high-energy photons.
meanings.sent1: During the photodisintegration, the nucleus splits due to powerful light particles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study photodisintegration to understand how nuclei can be shattered by photons.
meanings.sent3: The photodisintegration of the nucleus was like a tiny explosion inside the atom.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was so intense, it felt like a photodisintegration of emotions within her.
meanings.sent5: The photodisintegration of the nucleus was as sudden and dramatic as a lightning strike.

meanings.definition: The breaking apart of an atomic nucleus by the absorption of a photon.
meanings.sent1: The absorption of a photon can lead to the photodisintegration of an atomic nucleus.
meanings.sent2: Nuclear reactions can result in the photodisintegration of atoms when photons are involved.
meanings.sent3: The photodisintegration of the nucleus seemed like a magic trick performed by light.
meanings.sent4: The photodisintegration of the atomic nucleus was a silent but powerful event.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the photodisintegration of an atom was like watching a tiny universe collapse.
